short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that every PHP developer must have. Changes styles to php.net for a better experience of using documentation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open source extension that makes changes to the php.net website for better experience of using PHP documentation. Extension includes several improvements such as:

- Improves styling of the whole site
- You can run and edit code examples for functions
- Changes code examples to dark theme with nice highlighting
- Adds the ability to copy code examples
- Adds the ability to transfer PHP code examples to Code Sandbox
- Adds useful link related to PHP to the home page
- Adds a section of PHP-related videos to the home page
- Adds an ability to visit php.net website with a single mouse click on the extension icon

Changelog: https://github.com/php-revival/php-revival/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md

IT'S SAFE TO USE
- It's completely private, we don't get any input from the user
- It's Open Source. GitHub repository: github.com/php-revival/php-revival
- After clicking the extension icon you will be redirected to a php.net website
- The extension is completely free and will be free forever
- The extension is active only on php.net websites. It's disabled on all sites except php.net
- It doesn't make any requests to other servers

Please, if you know other PHP developers, give them a link to this extension. It will definitely help them along the way.

Any suggestions, bugs or feature requests on GitHub issues:
https://github.com/php-revival/php-revival/issues
